resources.string: No active paths.\n If you want to start working on a specific application, click on the "+" button. Otherwise, wait for StepByStep to suggest one app to work on.
Select this version if you need to use the phone but you don\'t want to use some apps for the duration of the Intervention. \nThe Intervention will try to make you avoid opening the selected apps.
StepByStep needs your permission to become an admin app. This permission is only required to automatically lock the screen in certain cases.
StepByStep needs the permission to collect data about your smartphone and apps usage.\nAfter giving the permission, you will need to go back to the app by clicking the back button of your phone.
StepByStep needs your permission to show you a dialog while you are using other apps.\nAfter giving the permission, you will need to go back to the app by clicking the back button of your phone.

Sometimes, the usage of apps such as StepByStep can be restricted by the phone. Check your battery optimization settings and allow StepByStep so that it can be launched at startup and won\'t be killed by the phone.

StepByStep needs your permission to be launched automatically. This permission could be already set.\nAfter giving the permission, you will need to go back to the app by clicking the back button of your phone.
StepByStep needs your permission to change the display brightness
You must enable StepByStep as an admin application
One minute left to the end of the Intervention! Eye on the clock!
You exceeded the Intervention duration by one minute! You should close %1$s and stop the Intervention.
You exceeded the Intervention duration by a lot! Close %1$s and stop the Intervention.
Nice . Now aim for the top
Not bad, but you can do better
You still have some work to do
C\'mon, I know you can do better
The Path\'s recap for level up is now available.
You will start a Monitoring Period on the application %1$s. \nFor the first week you just have to use your phone as usual but check StepByStep once per day.
You already have an active Path regarding the application %1$s. Do you want to start another one regardless?
Number of Interventions used in this level: %1$d
Total number of late Intervention opening
Total number of times the set duration was, even slightly, exceeded
Total seconds of excess in these cases
Total number of time the duration was exceeded by a lot (> 2 times the duration set)
You will move up a level in this Path. Do your best!
You will move down a level in this Path. Work hard and you will return here in no time.
Congratulations! You completed the Path with this application.\nNow you should be able to use the app the way you want without any help.

This Intervention is focused on the situations in which you decide to dedicate some time to use an application. \nThe objective of this Intervention is to help you keeping in check the time spent on th app. You will be asked to decide how much time you intend to spend on the app beforehand and you will have to try to keep your word. \nRemember to always activate this Intervention before opening the app, or else penalties will be added

In this level many clues will hep you to stick to the correct behaviour. \nPop-up windows will appear in certain situations. During the Intervention, the phone will vibrate or brightness will drop down to remember you to check the time.
In this level you will have less clues to help you. Pop-up windows, vibrations and brightness drops will be rarer.
In this level the clues are few. No pop-up windows and even fewer vibrations or brightness drops.
In this level there will be no more inputs to help you. Do your best!
Probably you weren\'t ready for this, let\'s move down a level and try again.
Your results are amazing! Let\'s go up by a level and continue like this.
Not bad nor good, the level will not change. Just improve a little and you will do it.
Congratulations! You successfully completed the maximum level of this intervention.
I noticed you have used a lot a certain application in the last 24h. Are you able to tell me which one?
%1$s You used a lot the app %2$s. Can you also tell me how much time you spent on it?
If you want to reduce your overall usage of this application, can I suggest to start a path on this app?
Select approximately the number of hours you spent on this app
It\'s still too early for the operation. \nCome again at 21:00.
You already did the estimation today. Come again tomorrow at 21:00.
Try to approximately estimate the number of hours you passed on %1$s today
Now try to estimate the number of times you opened %1$s today
You are ready to start a Path regarding %1$s.\n Go back to the home screen and click on the recap.
In the last days, you estimated your daily use of %1$s.\nThe purpose of this period was to make yourself conscious of your ability to perceive your average daily use of this app.
These are data on your real app usage in the last period
In my opinion, the main problem with %1$s is the huge number of times you opened it, even if you don\'t spend too much time on it. \nFor this reason, I suggest starting Path 1 on this app.
In my opinion, the main problem with %1$s is the amount of time you pass using it. \nFor this reason, I suggest starting Path 2 on this app.
It appears you have problem with this app concerning both the total time you spend on it and the number of times you open it. \nFor this reason, I suggest starting both Paths.
In the last days you\'ve kept an overall good behaviour on this app, so I don\'t have a specific Path to suggest. \nIf you want you can start a Path of your choice.
Do you need additional information about the Paths?
%1$s is marked as an app that don\'t have to be considered when proposing new Paths.\nDo you wish to remove it from this group?
Channel used by the app notifications
Channel used by the app for the notification of the foreground services started on boot
Channel used for the foreground notifications of the interventions
Suggestion to start monitoring an app
It appears you already have an active Path 1, so i will add this application to the existing Path.
It appears you already have an active Path 1, so i will add this application to the existing path.\nThe new Path 2 will be created normally.
It appears you already have an active Path 2 on this app, and it\'s not possible to have two Paths of the same type on the same application.
It appears you already have an active Path 2 on this app, and it\'s not possible to have two Paths of the same type on the same application.\nThe new Path 1 will be created normally.
It appears you already have both an active Path 1 and an active Path 2 on this app.\nUse these instead of creating a new Path (I will add this application to the existing Path 1).
You won\'t create any new Paths on this application. All the data collected in the Monitoring Period will be deleted.

In the last few days you have never activated Path 1 Interventions. \nPlease be honest and tell us if you forgot to activate it (a penalty will be applied during the next recap) or if you simply did\'t need to use it.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected path? \nOnce deleted, all the progressions will be lost.
StepByStep is an application designed to help you understand and learn how to use your device better.
You can monitor your daily phone usage on the Monitoring screen.

When you first install StepByStep a 7 days monitoring period will start. In this phase most of StepByStep functionalities won\'t be available and we will monitor your phone usage for the experiment. Please use your phone as usual and remember that all data are collected anonymously.\n StepByStep will notify you when this period ends.
A Path is an incremental program that should help you learn how to correctly use an application.\nA Path is made of some Interventions that will activate when you use the app.

When you start using an app the intervention will take care of keeping you aware, using scheduled vibrations and brightness drops. \nYour behaviour during the Intervention will be monitored and evaluated at the end.

Once you have done a certain number of Interventions, the results will be analyzed and you will go up or down a level in the path. Each level up means less clues to help you.\nWhen you clear the top level, your behaviour on the app will have improved and you won\'t need the app help anymore.
CoachBot will help you setting up StepByStep in all the main moments. Allow it to guide you through setting up your paths and feel free to ask whatever you don\'t understand.
Swipe a Path right to left to delete it

Are you sure you want to reset the status of all current Intervention? No results will be saved for the running ones.\nThis option should be used only if the app crashes when you try to start/stop an intervention.
Hi! I can help you personalize your path. Do you want to know the suggestions for the apps, the time and the interventions you should use?
Here are our raccomandations for you:
You haven\'t used any app in a dangerous way so far, so I have no suggestions for you
You can\'t start a path on an app you haven\'t used recently. Use it and try again

Please use your phone as usual. 
For studying purposes we will monitor your phone usage until %1$s/%2$s at %3$s:%4$s. 

You'll get a notification when monitoring phase is over.
Hi! You can\'t use this feature yet! Wait for the monitoring phase to end
